Instructure | Data Scientist | SLC, UT | ONSITE | Full Time

Instructure builds software that helps people learn, regardless of where they are in life. Our largest product is Canvas, a learning management system for Universities and K-12 institutions.

We are looking for a data scientist to join our small data science team. We are primarily tasked with building models and finding insights that can become part of one of our products. This is a chance to get in on the bottom floor of a growing data science team!

If you are interested apply below, and if you have questions email me (I'm the team lead) directly gromrell [at] instructure.com

-Greg
